main event: A round object the size of a big ball was sighted from a car near Sanderson, Texas.
interesting points: The sighting was observed for approximately five minutes.,The object was potentially an astronomical object or an aircraft.,The identification of the object remains unknown.,It was reported from a distance using binoculars.,No unusual phenomena were detected by radar.
sighted object: a round object the size of a big ball
witness description: individual who observed the object from a car
